participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Energetic and playful, with a love for nostalgia and creativity.
participant_1.background: I love New Kids on the Block. My favorite toy as a child was my Lite-Brite. I was born in the early 80s and I also enjoy old school hip hop. I take dance lessons once a week.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outdoorsy, always looking for the next challenge.
participant_2.background: I like to go hiking in the spring. My favorite activity is rock climbing. I have a black lab named Trooper. I live in Colorado and I'm a mechanical engineer.

content.text: because colorado is where i do live
there is nothing better than being a mechanical engineer in colorado! wish i have a job
i've a black lab named trooper because it sounds like booper
and it sounds awesome when i shout it's name when i go hiking in the spring because i like it
my favorite activity is rock climbing up your mom because she's that fat
